mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CALENDER(calender_no, calender_date_start, calender_time_start, calender_date_end, calender_time_end, calender_subject, calender_content, calender_place, calender_writer, calender_group, calender_time) values(seq_calender_no.nextval, #{calenderDateStart}, #{calenderTimeStart}, #{calenderDateEnd}, #{calenderTimeEnd}, #{calenderSubject}, #{calenderContent}, #{calenderPlace}, #{calenderWriter}, #{calenderGroup}, SYSDATE)
